channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street lamp out near 13 Montpelier Walk, 4th November
item.description:
Street lamp has been out for over a month. VERY dark on street. Thank you for repair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Rutland Gate, Knightsbridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerosene/Fuel leak from vehicle at parking spot., 4th November
item.description:
Note: vehicle in image was meerly parked at time of photoing, it does not look like the source of the issue. Fuel leak which needs to be cleaned up as it is slippery and an enviromental hazard. Smells like kerosene. Photos show glimmer of oil now scattered across a section of the council residents parking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70-90, Woolstaplers Way, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road has been repaired now sunk, 4th November
item.description:
It's dangerous as you come down the road towards Park View Road as the road has sunk, it's dangerous turning into the access road at back of the flats as you need to go onto the damaged road to turn left.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Roseacre Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Low level branches, 4th November
item.description:
The oak tree has grown considerably and has many very low level branches. Some of which are falling. It needs cutting back and Pruning. I live in a neighboring garden in which this tree is overhanging. Twice this month whilst with my wheelchair bound daughter in our garden she has been closely hit by falling branches. Please help

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Towncourt Lane, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastic debris scatteredcalong pavement, 4th November
item.description:
A large amount of plastic rubbish dumped on the pavement in opposite 149 - 130 Slades Drive, which has been reported. However, some of this plastic has blown along the fence/curbline to a length of approx 50 metres or so. Please make the appropriate arrangements to have this detritus collected along its length and removed. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81-87, Slades Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights out in Embankment Gardens, 4th November
item.description:
At least 15 lights along the walking paths in Embankment Gardens are currently not working and haven't been for several months despite this being reported before. This is dangerous for walking and personal safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Savoy Place, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing tree, 4th November
item.description:
We live in a very pretty tree lined street, a pink flowering cherry tree was cut down outside our house in May 2023 with the promise of another one to be planted in its place, still no tree has been planted, other trees have been replaced, please could you let me know when this will happen. Thankyou
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Walsingham Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees along the road near 182-200 Kings Hall road overhanging road, 4th November
item.description:
The trees all the way along both sides of Kings Hall Road near houses 182-200 and on the other side all have branches that overhang the road and hang low. Lorries hit the branches and they are very dangerous, the branches from trees on both sides of the road near enough touch each other and completely make it so dark when driving along that road. They need to be pruned
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
